rval.value: Append lines if they don\'t exist
Insert the template file into the file being edited
Uncomment lines matching a regular expression
Comment out lines in a file
Uncomment a line containing a fragment
Warn about lines in a file
Append a line to the file if it doesn\'t already exist
Append lines to the file if they don\'t already exist
Remove all entries in the region so there are no extra entries
Match a line starting like key = something
Match a line starting like key = something
Dynamic Class created if patterns matching
Class created if user does not exist
Append users into a password file format
Class created if group does not exist
Append users into a group file format
Edit a colon-separated file, using the first field as a key
Edit a user attribute in the password file
Append users into a password file format
Expand variables in the template file
A user\'s regular batch jobs are added to this file
Most crons need to be huped after file changes

promises.promiser:
mail=
instance=unique
partial=nocheck
runlevel=nocheck
idepend=nocheck
rdepend=nocheck
space=nocheck
setuid=nocheck
conflict=nocheck
action=nocheck
networktimeout=60
networkretries=3
authentication=quit
keystore=/var/sadm/security
proxy=
basedir=default

rval.value: Insert contents of Solaris admin file (automatically install packages)
Check if to start a service
Check if to restart a service
Check if to reload a service
Check if to stop a service
Verify that the service appears in the process table
Verify that the service does not appear in the process
Execute command to start the $(service) service
Execute command to restart the $(service) service
Execute command to reload the $(service) service
It\'s useful to know if a given path is defined
It\'s useful to know if $(all_paths) exists on the filesystem as defined
(State: not installed|E: Unable to locate package .*)
(State: not installed|E: Unable to locate package .*)

<domain type=\'kvm\'>
  <name>$(name)</name>
  <memory>$(mem_kb)</memory>
  <currentMemory>$(mem_kb)</currentMemory>
  <vcpu>$(cpu_count)</vcpu>
  <os>
    <type arch=\'$(arch)\'>hvm</type>
  </os>
  <features>
    <acpi/>
    <apic/>
    <pae/>
  </features>
  <on_poweroff>destroy</on_poweroff>
  <on_reboot>restart</on_reboot>
  <on_crash>restart</on_crash>
  <devices>
    <emulator>/usr/bin/kvm</emulator>
    <disk type=\'file\' device=\'disk\'>
      <source file=\'$(disk_file)\'/>
      <target dev=\'vda\' bus=\'virtio\'/>
    </disk>
    <interface type=\'network\'>
      <source network=\'default\'/>
    </interface>
    <input type=\'mouse\' bus=\'ps2\'/>
    <graphics type=\'vnc\' port=\'-1\' autoport=\'yes\'/>
  </devices>
</domain>
